topic.title: Front Matter and Back Matter - Built-in CSS

body.p: The built-in CSS rules are in [PLUGIN_DIR]/css/p-bookmap-frontmatter-backmatter.css. By default, it associates the oxy:front-matter and oxy:back-matter elements with the matter page, that has no headers or other page margin boxes. Each of the child topics start on a new page.
